tool_description: The USA License Plate to VIN API allows users to extract vehicle information and VIN numbers from any license plate in the United States. With support for all 50 states, this API can provide valuable information for businesses or individuals in need of accurate and up-to-date vehicle data.
name: USA License Plate to VIN API
title: USA License Plate to VIN API
tool_name: USA License Plate to VIN API

api_list.name: License Plate Decoder
api_list.description:
Extract any VIN number associated with a Licence Plate with ease. 

Be able to retrieve additional information like Model, Maker, Year, and more.

api_list.name: Supported States
api_list.description: Retrieve the States List with all the States supported in this API.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://usa-license-plate-to-vin-api.p.rapidapi.com/states"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "usa-license-plate-to-vin-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://usa-license-plate-to-vin-api.p.rapidapi.com/states"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "usa-license-plate-to-vin-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
